zh.our_service_intro: 无需个人信用，无需卖币，1小时极速放款
zh.our_service_example: 例如：贷款10,000元，贷款周期90天，贷款利息为2700元（年化利率27%），到期一次性还本还息。
zh.our_service_annual_interest_rate_intro: 贷款周期越长，年化利率越低，平均年化利率18%
zh.tip_link: 6月11号之前的比赛请点击此处

en.our_service_intro: No credit requirement, no token selling, loan giving in 1 hour
en.our_service_example: For example, the loan is 10,000 yuan, the loan period is 90 days, the loan interest is 2700 yuan (annualized interest rate 27%), and one-off due repayment
en.our_service_annual_interest_rate_intro: The longer the loan cycle, the lower the annualized interest rate, and the average annualized interest rate is 18%.
en.our_service_loan_cycle_list: Provide 7 days, 14 days, 30 days, 90 days of products
en.tip_link: 6月11号之前的比赛请点击此处
